description:
"So, are you feeling more comfortable fucking dudes?"
I was sitting with Owen before the shoot and that's what I wanted to know. He hadn't met Billy yet.
"Yeah, it's not bad actually. Tighter than a pussy, actually."
"Well that's good," I said, laughing. "I'm glad you're enjoying yourself."
I like Owen. He's a good guy.
I took him into the next room where Billy was getting ready.
"Owen, this is Billy," I said. Billy was naked and had a butt plug up his ass.
"Nice to meet you," Billy said shyly. "I'd shake your hand, but, well..." And he pointed to his ass.
They both laughed. I could tell by the look in his eyes that Billy liked the young hunk standing in front of him.
Then they were ready.
"How do you feel about kissing?"
"I like it," Owen said.
He's such an erotic kisser. Very tender and sincere. I loved the way Owen caressed Billy's hairy chest as they made out...
title: Owen & Billy
